# stemtools

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Color palettes, ploting functions and more for working at Stem.

## Installation

You can install the development version of `stemtools` from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("stem-cz/stemtools")
```
